Tucson.Toltecalli High School: Toltecalli High School, also known as Toltecalli Academy, is a public charter high school, located in Tucson, Arizona, United States. Toltecalli High School is one of three high schools in the Calli Ollin School District, located in downtown Tucson, and is operated by CPLC Community Schools. Founded in 2004, Toltecalli High School now serves approximately 150 students in grades nine through twelve.
